name: Byte Family
description: Overcome obstacles and restore the cyber world ByteFamily, eliminating the system virus, unlocking new game modes and gaining new skills!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: DualCore 1.8 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: QuadCore 2.4 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 100 MB available space
